text: Bálint Tömösvári (born 14 June 1998) is a Hungarian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Győri ETO FC on loan from Budapest Honvéd FC in NB I. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |-||-||-||-|- |rowspan="5" valign="center"|Budapest Honvéd II |- |2015–16 |5||1||0||0||0||0||5||1 |- |2016–17 |22||6||0||0||0||0||22||6 |- |2017–18 |15||2||0||0||0||0||15||2 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||42||9||0||0||0||0||42||9 |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Budapest Honvéd |- |2016–17 |3||0||2||2||0||0||5||2 |- |2017–18 |11||0||2||0||1||0||14||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||14||0||4||2||1||0||19||2 |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Kaposvár |- |2018–19 |28||3||2||0||–||–||30||3 |- |2019–20 |1||1||0||0||–||–||1||1 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||29||4||2||0||0||0||31||4 |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |rowspan="1" valign="top"|Career Total | |85||13||6||2||1||0||92||15 |} Updated to games played as of 15 December 2019. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Szolnok Category:Association football forwards Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Budapest Honvéd FC players Category:Budapest Honvéd FC II players Category:Kaposvári Rákóczi FC players Category:Győri ETO FC players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság II players
title: Bálint Tömösvári
